description: This is a React component named 'Partners' that manages a list of partners, including functionalities to load, display, add, edit, and delete partner entries. It interacts with a backend API for data operations and uses internal state for managing form inputs and loading/error states.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch the list of partners from the backend API and update the component state.

methods.name: onEdit
methods.description: Prepares the form with selected partner data for editing.

methods.name: onCancel
methods.description: Resets the form to its initial empty state, canceling any ongoing edits.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a partner entry after user confirmation and refreshes the data list.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission to create or update a partner record via API calls.
